item.title: Former Zelensky Spox: Ukraine Must Sign Peace Deal To Avoid Even Greater Losses
item.description: 'Every subsequent deal for Ukraine will only be worse - because we are losing. We are losing people, territory, and the economy,' Iuliia Mendel said.

item.title: The (Reasonable) Luxury Gift Guide For The Least Practical Person You Know
item.description: If you (er, your giftees) like little extravagances or fancy versions of everyday items, this might be the gift guide for you.

item.title: Bishops Vote To Prohibit Trans Surgeries And Hormone Treatment In Catholic Hospitals
item.description: Catholic teaching on gender is clear, but many Catholic hospitals have blatantly ignored it and performed transgender surgeries.

item.title: Elizabeth Warren Yells ‘Soak The Rich’ While Making Millions On Wall Street
item.description: Financial records examined by RealClearInvestigations show that Warren has hardly followed the path of socialism in her personal finances.

item.title: Exclusive: Lawsuit Claims Leftist Benson Is Breaking Michigan Election Law
item.description: Secretary of State Jocelyn Benson's lax residency directive is 'unconstitutional and unlawful,' the RNC lawsuit alleges.
